price: Je! Haikuwa kwao ni Ishara kwamba wanayajua haya wanazuoni wa Wana wa Israili?.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
footnotes: Je! Hawa wenye inda wanaikataa Qur'ani na hali wao wanayo hoja inayo onyesha ukweli wa Muhammad s.a.w., nayo ni ilimu ya wanazuoni wa Wana wa Issraili juu ya Qur'ani kama ilivyo katika vitabu vyao?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
